plot: Poisoned by the city's pressure to develop a professional identity, Brian Barton; 24, sets out to find a job, find an identity, and find out that all he really needs is a friend.
title: Melon Soda
plot_es: Poisoned by the city's pressure to develop a professional identity, Brian Barton; 24, sets out to find a job, find an identity, and find out that all he really needs is a friend.
plot_en: Poisoned by the city's pressure to develop a professional identity, Brian Barton; 24, sets out to find a job, find an identity, and find out that all he really needs is a friend.
